body:
The whl file built by build_pip_package is too specific, e.g.,:

Copied wheel file: tensorflow-0.11.0rc2-cp27-cp27m-macosx_10_11_x86_64.whl --> tensorflow-0.11.0rc2-py2-none-any.whl

If I remember correctly, if we don't do thisrenamin, our whl files will not install properly on all mac versions.
body_html:

body_text:
The whl file built by build_pip_package is too specific, e.g.,:
Copied wheel file: tensorflow-0.11.0rc2-cp27-cp27m-macosx_10_11_x86_64.whl --> tensorflow-0.11.0rc2-py2-none-any.whl
If I remember correctly, if we don't do thisrenamin, our whl files will not install properly on all mac versions.
